Kruskal-Wallis test showed a significant difference in the variance between groups (p-value 0.031).
Dunn's post-hoc test with BH correction showed a significant difference between the variance of Before_A and After_A groups (adjusted p-value 0.023).

Comparison After_A-Before_A:
Out of 12 comparisons, 2 were significantly different with qval <  0.05.
Zea mays was significantly different between Before_A and After_A, with a log2(FC) of -9.351 (qval. 0.011).
Pristionchus pacificus was significantly different between Before_A and After_A, with a log2(FC) of 6.804 (qval. 0.012).

Comparison After_B-Before_B:
Out of 12 comparisons, 0 were significantly different with qval <  0.05.
